sourcesContent:
<!-- ============================================================== -->
<!-- Simple four boxes Row -->
<!-- ============================================================== -->
<mat-card class="cardWithShadow">
    <mat-card-content>
      <video [src]="url" height="200" controls></video>
      <iframe width="100%" height="1000" frameBorder="0" [src]="url"></iframe>
      <!-- <mat-card-title>Sample Page</mat-card-title>
      <mat-card-subtitle class="mat-body-1">This is test page</mat-card-subtitle> -->
      <app-sample-page (uploadedVideoFile)="goToVideo($event)"></app-sample-page>
    </mat-card-content>
  </mat-card>
